title: Anti-corruption unrest threatens Nepal’s nascent economic recovery
description:
Nepal's economic's recovery hurt by another crisis

Nepal’s fragile economic recovery is under new strain as violent anti-corruption protests threaten to undo recent gains.

Growth was projected to exceed 4 percent in the current fiscal year, after inflation eased to 4.2 percent, the slowest in four...

title: The economic undercurrents in Nepal’s rage against the machine | Number Theory
description: Nepal is in chaos after two days of 'Gen Z protests'. The protests are supposedly against a (now withdrawn) government order banning social media websites, although some believe that was just the trigger and that the real reason is anger against widespread corruption. title: The week in charts: Fitch's growth bets, unrest in Nepal, iPhone Air unveiled
description:

title: Nepal protest highlights: Govt says ban revoked as per demands of Gen Z
description:
In a late night development, the Nepal government lifted revoked the ban it has imposed on social media.

Nepal home minister Ramesh Lekhak also resigned following the clashes, tendering his resignation to PM KP Sharma Oli. Lekhak stepped down on moral grounds during a cabinet meeting.

description:

title: 200 Telugu people stranded in Nepal, Minister Lokesh monitoring situation: Andhra CM

title: Nepal Gen Z protest: India closely monitoring situation, asks its nationals to exercise caution amid unrest
description:
Nepal Gen Z protest: India closely monitoring situation, asks its nationals to exercise caution amid unrest The Nepal government has withdrawn its earlier decision to ban social media sites after violent protests by youths that left at least 19 people dead and over 300 others injured.

title: Nepal Gen Z protest: Defer travelling to Nepal until situation eases, citizens already there shall avoid stepping out, says MEA; issues helpline number
description:

title: Nepal situation 'improved': Indian embassy in Kathmandu issues new travel advisory, calls for caution — check details
description:
Amid improvement in the political crisis in Nepal, India on Friday issued an advisory for its nationals travelling to the Himalayan nation, asking them to exercise due caution.
